lead_paragraph: BARON--Charles S.,of Boynton Beach, FL, died at age 78 on March 22. He is survived by his wife, Carolyn and his children Lauren Laporte and David Baron and six grandchildren, Isadora, Avery, Matthew, Alison, Rosalie and Caleb. Funeral to be held at Riverdale Temple, March 25 at 11am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARON, CHARLES S.
